event.title: Matthias Kirschner talks about FSFs at Campus Party Europe

body.p: On August 24, Matthias Kirschner will give a speech at Campus Party. "The FSFS- Fighting for your freedom, since 1985" is the topic of this talk that will be held at 14.30 at the Socrates Stage, of this event organized in Berlin.

event.tags: campus party Berlin n ci Free Software FSF De front-page
